title: Multimedia-Based Mathematical Concept Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and possession of job-related foundational skills
context.additional_context: Cultivating Visual Mathematical Modeling Skills for Workplace Application Among Professionals in Healthcare, Legal, and Technical Fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify core information with 85% accuracy using signal-emphasis techniques in multimodal (text, formula, graphic) materials
Learners visualize abstract mathematical concepts by adding graphic elements and achieve clarity scores of 4 or higher (5-point scale) during peer evaluations
Learners can create portfolios explaining the synergistic effects of signal-emphasis and graphic-addition strategies based on prior knowledge levels
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
